fault_description: High-pitched squeal on start-up and a faint burnt smell after a few minutes.
root_cause: Bearing lubrication failure leading to overheating.
corrective_action: Replace bearings, re-grease to OEM spec, and implement a lubrication schedule.

fault_description: Motor hums loudly and trips the breaker as soon as it tries to turn.
root_cause: Locked rotor due to misalignment or seized load.
corrective_action: Decouple the load, verify the rotor spins freely, correct alignment and check for seized components.

fault_description: Noticeable vibration after recent maintenance; vibration amplitude increases with speed.
root_cause: Rotor imbalance or coupling misalignment.
corrective_action: Perform dynamic balancing and re-align the coupling to tolerance.

fault_description: Running hot with reduced torque; terminals feel warm.
root_cause: Single-phasing or voltage imbalance.
corrective_action: Check supply fuses and phases, tighten terminals, correct feed imbalance.

fault_description: Visible arcing at brushes and erratic speed (DC motor).
root_cause: Worn brushes and contaminated commutator.
corrective_action: Replace brushes, skim/clean commutator, verify brush spring tension.

fault_description: Signs of moisture ingress; insulation resistance is low.
root_cause: Water ingress degrading insulation.
corrective_action: Dry the windings, perform IR/megger test, improve enclosure sealing/IP rating.

fault_description: Single-phase motor struggles to start in cold weather; occasional buzzing.
root_cause: Start/run capacitor degradation.
corrective_action: Test and replace the capacitor; verify correct capacitance rating.

fault_description: Pump runs but there is no flow; discharge valve was partly closed.
root_cause: Impeller blockage or valve position causing starvation.
corrective_action: Open/verify valves, inspect/clear impeller and suction strainer.

fault_description: Loud rattling and “gravel” sound; pressure fluctuates.
root_cause: Low NPSH or air ingress on suction side causing cavitation.
corrective_action: Check suction head, seal leaks on suction, re-prime and reduce suction lift.

fault_description: Mechanical seal area is wet and dripping.
root_cause: Seal face wear or damaged O-rings.
corrective_action: Replace mechanical seal, verify alignment and flush plan as required.

fault_description: Discharge pressure is lower than last month at same speed.
root_cause: Impeller wear or excessive clearances.
corrective_action: Inspect/overhaul impeller and wear rings; restore clearances.

fault_description: Trips on overload; strong burning smell; shaft hard to turn by hand.
root_cause: Seized bearing or jammed impeller.
corrective_action: Strip pump, replace bearings, clear debris and flush casing.

fault_description: New vibration after pipework change; grows with flow.
root_cause: Piping strain transmitted to casing; misalignment.
corrective_action: Add/support pipe hangers, re-align pump and motor, grout base as needed.

fault_description: Loses prime overnight; needs manual prime each morning.
root_cause: Non-return/foot valve leaking back.
corrective_action: Inspect and replace the check/foot valve; verify seating and cleanliness.

fault_description: High discharge temperature and reduced efficiency.
root_cause: Cooling failure due to fouled intercooler or fan issue.
corrective_action: Clean/flush intercooler, check fan operation and thermostat.

fault_description: Oil visible in downstream air tools and receivers.
root_cause: Saturated or failed oil separator element.
corrective_action: Replace separator, verify oil level and differential pressure across element.

fault_description: Slow to build pressure; inlet sounds restricted.
root_cause: Clogged intake air filter.
corrective_action: Replace/clean intake filter; inspect intake ducting.

fault_description: Unit trips on high vibration; mounts look worn.
root_cause: Imbalance or loose mounting.
corrective_action: Inspect/replace mounts, balance rotating parts, tighten fixings.

fault_description: Short cycling: frequent start/stop around setpoint.
root_cause: Incorrect pressure switch deadband or system leak.
corrective_action: Adjust pressure switch deadband; leak-test and repair fittings.

fault_description: Water in air line and tools.
root_cause: Dryer/aftercooler malfunction or drain failure.
corrective_action: Service/repair dryer, check condensate drains and receiver purge.

fault_description: Loud metallic knocking from head; output drops.
root_cause: Damaged valve plate or reeds.
corrective_action: Inspect and replace valve plate/reeds; check for debris and re-torque.

fault_description: Motor runs with intermittent jerks and an occasional clunking noise.
root_cause: Loose coupling or worn keyway.
corrective_action: Inspect coupling and keyway, tighten or replace as necessary.

fault_description: Strong ozone smell and sparks visible from casing vents.
root_cause: Breakdown of winding insulation causing arcing.
corrective_action: Take motor out of service, test windings with megger, rewind or replace stator.

fault_description: Motor speed fluctuates without changes to load; amp readings unstable.
root_cause: Variable frequency drive (VFD) fault or power quality issue.
corrective_action: Check VFD output, inspect for harmonics or supply instability, reset/replace VFD if required.

fault_description: Motor will not start; only a faint click heard from contactor.
root_cause: Contactor or starter coil failure.
corrective_action: Test and replace contactor or starter coil.

fault_description: After rain, the motor fails insulation resistance test.
root_cause: Condensation inside terminal box.
corrective_action: Dry out terminal, check for leaks, use anti-condensation heaters if needed.

fault_description: Operator reports excessive motor noise after fitting new fan.
root_cause: Incorrect fan blade installation causing imbalance.
corrective_action: Check fan blade orientation and balance, correct and re-test.

fault_description: Pump makes high-pitched whine, flow rate drops suddenly.
root_cause: Air pocket trapped in casing (air lock).
corrective_action: Vent casing, bleed system, check for suction leaks.

fault_description: Pulsing pressure gauge; vibration at specific speeds only.
root_cause: Pump resonance or baseplate not grouted.
corrective_action: Secure baseplate, check for resonance, add vibration damping.

fault_description: Suction pressure lower than usual despite open valve.
root_cause: Partially clogged suction line or filter.
corrective_action: Inspect and clear suction piping and filter basket.

fault_description: Unusual blue smoke seen at pump gland area.
root_cause: Packing overheating from over-tightening.
corrective_action: Loosen packing gland, replace packing if damaged, check lubrication.

fault_description: Pump stops after running for 30 minutes, feels excessively hot.
root_cause: Insufficient cooling or dry running.
corrective_action: Check cooling system, ensure fluid is present, prevent dry run conditions.

fault_description: Pump vibrates more after moving to a new base.
root_cause: Pump and driver not aligned post-move.
corrective_action: Re-align pump and driver to manufacturer’s tolerances.

fault_description: Excessive moisture collects in the aftercooler.
root_cause: Aftercooler drain blockage.
corrective_action: Clean or replace drain, check float operation.

fault_description: Pressure drops steadily during operation; hissing sound near manifold.
root_cause: Air leak from manifold or discharge piping.
corrective_action: Use leak detection spray, repair or replace leaking sections.

fault_description: Unit vibrates only at start and shutdown.
root_cause: Soft foot or mounting bolt looseness.
corrective_action: Check and tighten all mounting bolts, shim to eliminate soft foot.

fault_description: Oil level drops quickly; oily residue around crankcase.
root_cause: Crankcase gasket failure or excessive blow-by.
corrective_action: Replace gasket, inspect piston rings for blow-by.

fault_description: High current draw but no output pressure.
root_cause: Broken drive belt or coupling slip.
corrective_action: Inspect drive belt/coupling, tighten or replace as necessary.

fault_description: Periodic loud bang from compressor; trips on overload.
root_cause: Hydraulic lock due to liquid slugging.
corrective_action: Check for liquid in suction line, install suction accumulator if needed.

fault_description: Motor runs fine but trips thermal overload on hot days.
root_cause: Cooling fan blocked or ambient temperature too high.
corrective_action: Clean cooling fan, improve ventilation, check for external heat sources.

fault_description: Shaft shows visible scoring after seal replacement.
root_cause: Incorrect seal installation or misalignment during assembly.
corrective_action: Inspect shaft and seal, correct installation procedure, replace damaged parts.

fault_description: Operator hears 'knocking' noise when pump starts and stops.
root_cause: Pipework water hammer due to rapid valve operation.
corrective_action: Fit anti-hammer device, train operators to open/close valves slowly.

fault_description: Pressure gauge oscillates violently when system flow is low.
root_cause: Incorrectly sized or faulty pulsation dampener.
corrective_action: Install correct pulsation dampener or service existing one.

fault_description: Temperature gauge spikes during extended use, but recovers when unit idles.
root_cause: Intermittent cooling fan fault.
corrective_action: Test fan for intermittent operation, replace faulty wiring or fan motor.

fault_description: Output air smells burnt, especially after extended runs.
root_cause: Overheated oil due to insufficient lubrication or wrong oil type.
corrective_action: Change oil, use manufacturer-specified lubricant, check lubrication schedule.

fault_description: High-pitched squeal on start-up; faint burnt odour after a few minutes.
root_cause: Bearing lubrication failure leading to overheating.
corrective_action: Replace bearings, re‑grease to OEM spec, and implement a lubrication schedule.

fault_description: Motor hums and trips the breaker on attempt to start.
root_cause: Locked rotor due to misalignment or seized load.
corrective_action: Decouple load, verify free rotation, correct alignment, check for seized components.

fault_description: Noticeable vibration after coupling change; amplitude rises with speed.
root_cause: Rotor imbalance or coupling misalignment.
corrective_action: Dynamic balance rotor and re‑align coupling to tolerance.

fault_description: Running unusually hot; terminals warm to the touch.
root_cause: Single‑phasing or voltage imbalance.
corrective_action: Inspect fuses and phases, tighten terminals, correct supply imbalance.

fault_description: Visible arcing at brushes, erratic speed (DC retrofit drive).
root_cause: Worn brushes and contaminated commutator.
corrective_action: Replace brushes, skim/clean commutator, verify brush spring tension.

fault_description: Insulation resistance low after washdown; evidence of moisture.
root_cause: Water ingress degrading insulation.
corrective_action: Dry windings (oven/space heaters), IR/PI test, improve enclosure sealing/IP rating.

fault_description: Struggles to start in cold weather; intermittent buzzing.
root_cause: Start/run capacitor degradation (for capacitor‑start).
corrective_action: Test/replace capacitor with correct rating; verify starter circuit.

fault_description: Periodic thump once per revolution at low speed.
root_cause: Flat‑spotted bearing or looseness in foot bolts.
corrective_action: Replace bearings, check soft‑foot, re‑torque base fixings.

fault_description: Audible 50 Hz hum; one phase current elevated; discoloured lugs.
root_cause: High‑resistance connection at terminals.
corrective_action: Isolate, clean and tighten terminals; replace damaged lugs; verify phase balance.

fault_description: Shaft too hot to touch; mild scraping noise on rundown.
root_cause: Internal fan rubbing or endshield misalignment.
corrective_action: Re‑seat endshield, check clearances, replace internal fan if damaged.

fault_description: Frequent overload trips during high ambient temps.
root_cause: Cooling path obstructed or undersized fan cover.
corrective_action: Clean cooling passages, confirm fan type, consider TEFC guard upgrade.

fault_description: Vibration spike post-maintenance; keyway chatter marks seen.
root_cause: Loose coupling key or fretting corrosion.
corrective_action: Replace key, apply anti‑fretting compound, correct interference fit.

fault_description: Pump runs but no flow; discharge valve partly closed earlier.
root_cause: Impeller blockage or suction starvation.
corrective_action: Open/verify valves; inspect/clear impeller and suction strainer.

fault_description: Loud rattling “gravel” sound; pressure fluctuates.
root_cause: Cavitation from low NPSH or air ingress on suction.
corrective_action: Check static head, seal suction leaks, re‑prime, reduce suction lift.

fault_description: Mechanical seal area wet and dripping.
root_cause: Seal face wear or damaged O‑rings.
corrective_action: Replace mechanical seal; verify alignment; set flush plan.

fault_description: Discharge pressure lower than last month at same speed.
root_cause: Impeller wear or excessive clearances.
corrective_action: Inspect/overhaul impeller and wear rings; restore clearances.

fault_description: Trips on overload; burning smell; shaft stiff by hand.
root_cause: Seized bearing or jammed impeller.
corrective_action: Strip pump, replace bearings, clear debris, flush casing.

fault_description: New vibration after pipework modification; increases with flow.
root_cause: Piping strain transmitted to casing; misalignment.
corrective_action: Add/support pipe hangers; re‑align pump/motor; grout base.

fault_description: Loses prime overnight; requires manual prime in morning.
root_cause: Leaking foot/check valve.
corrective_action: Inspect/replace check valve; verify seating and cleanliness.

fault_description: High bearing temperature after seal replacement.
root_cause: Misaligned shaft or over‑tightened gland.
corrective_action: Re‑align shaft; check seal installation; reset gland compression.

fault_description: Vibration at vane‑pass frequency; reduced efficiency.
root_cause: Impeller fouling or partial blockage.
corrective_action: Clean volute/impeller; install suction strainer alarm.

fault_description: Erratic discharge pressure; intermittent air bubbles.
root_cause: Suction vortex/entrainment from low submergence.
corrective_action: Increase submergence, add anti‑vortex plate, slow suction velocity.

fault_description: Stuffing box runs dry and hot.
root_cause: Inadequate flush or blocked lantern ring.
corrective_action: Restore flush plan; clean lantern ring; consider mechanical seal retrofit.

fault_description: Noisy operation; resonance near 2900 rpm.
root_cause: Baseplate not grouted; soft‑foot present.
corrective_action: Grout base; correct soft‑foot; perform bump test to confirm shift.

fault_description: High discharge temperature; efficiency down.
root_cause: Fouled intercooler or failed cooling fan.
corrective_action: Clean/flush intercooler; verify fan and thermostat operation.

fault_description: Oil visible in downstream tools and receivers.
root_cause: Saturated/failed oil separator element.
corrective_action: Replace separator; verify oil level and ∆P across element.

fault_description: Short cycling around setpoint.
root_cause: Incorrect pressure switch deadband or system leak.
corrective_action: Adjust deadband; leak‑test and repair fittings.

fault_description: Water in airline and tools.
root_cause: Dryer/aftercooler malfunction or drain failure.
corrective_action: Service dryer; check condensate drains; receiver purge.

fault_description: Knocking from head; output drops.
root_cause: Damaged valve plate or reeds.
corrective_action: Inspect/replace valve plate/reeds; remove debris and re‑torque.

fault_description: High oil carryover after service; ∆P across separator low.
root_cause: Incorrect separator element or damaged seals.
corrective_action: Install correct element; replace seals; verify crankcase venting.

fault_description: Flow pulsation; discharge pressure oscillates ±0.3 bar.
root_cause: Faulty inlet modulation valve control.
corrective_action: Calibrate/replace modulation valve; check control loop tuning.

fault_description: Excess current draw at start; weak acceleration.
root_cause: Star/delta timing error or stuck contactor.
corrective_action: Verify starter timing; inspect/replace contactors.

fault_description: High gearbox temperature warning.
root_cause: Low oil level or cooler bypass stuck.
corrective_action: Top up with OEM oil; service cooler/bypass; check for leaks.

fault_description: Audible hiss near intercooler; efficiency drop.
root_cause: Intercooler leak to atmosphere.
corrective_action: Pressure test intercooler; repair/replace core; retorque clamps.
